scripts.integration:startServer: cd ../server && prisma delete -e .env.test -f && prisma deploy -e .env.test && dotenv -e .env.test -- nodemon -e ts,graphql -x ts-node src/index.ts
scripts.integration:test: wait-for-server http://localhost:3030 --tries 90 --quiet && wait-for-server http://localhost:4000 --tries 90 --quiet && npm run cypress:run
